## Setup

In order to use [GitHub Copilot Chat](https://docs.github.com/en/copilot/github-copilot-chat/about-github-copilot-chat), 
you will first need to have [GitHub Copilot](https://docs.github.com/en/copilot) 
setup in your RStudio IDE. If you do not have Copilot setup in your RStudio yet, 
please refer to these instructions: https://docs.posit.co/ide/user/ide/guide/tools/copilot.html
